title: Join Active Directory (AD) domain
description: Joins the virtual machine to the given Active Directory domain and reboots the machine.

domainAdminUsername.description: The Active Directory (AD) account (e.g. CORP\user or user@corp.contoso.com) that has permissions to join the domain

domainAdminPassword.description: The password for the domain join user account.

domainToJoin.description: The name of the Active Directory (AD) domain to join (e.g. corp.contoso.com).

ouPath.description: Optional. Only required if you have configured organizational units in your domain; leave blank otherwise. For example, OU=Workstations,OU=Machines,DC=corp,DC=contoso,DC=com. Where 'Workstations' and 'Machines' are 2 organizational units configured in your domain.
